message: Feeling eyes on me, I turn around. Mink is staring at me while puffing on his pipe.
The way he lounges on the couch reminds me of the ordeal in that abandoned building.
Only a few days have passed, but it feels like ages.

name: ミンク
message: "Looks like your Allmate's smarter than you."
I answer with a silent glare, reminding myself why I came here.
I have to stop Toue and save the Old Residential District.
Cooperating with Mink is the best way to do that.
Like Ren said, his plan has a high chance of success.
But while I understand that on an intellectual level, emotionally, it's difficult.
I'm doing the right thing... aren't I?
Hugging Ren close, I move to the wall and sit down on the floor.
I gently stroke Ren's back, looking anywhere but at Mink.
Am I really doing the right thing?
Is this really okay? Dragging Ren into my mess and even turning him into a tool...
Ren looks up at me with his tongue hanging out.
When I see his stupid little face, all the guilt and regret I've been trying to suppress wells up inside me.
I bury my face in his fur, choking back the feelings crashing over me.
I'm so sorry, Ren...
I stay like that until the wave of emotion has passed.
